Name: Records of mosquitoes feeding on plant nectar
Description: A systematic map of different species of mosquitoes feeding on plant nectar. A total of 384 records of 74 species of mosquitoes feeding on 156 species and 6 genera of different plants were identified in the selected articles. Each record contains information about the year, location, plant family where mosquitoes feed on, methodological approach, reasons for the selection of plants and purposes of the studies

Fields.Name: Geographic location
Fields.Description: Location where the record was observed

Fields.Description: The main species assessed in the study

Fields.Description: The outcome measures used to infer mosquito - plant interactions.
